abstract: Auto Racing Roundup; memorial service is held in Indianapolis to remember life of Dan Wheldon, who was killed in crash at Las Vegas; former teammates and bosses provide dozens of stories about the roles Wheldon played--fierce competitor on the tract, comedian off it and loving father and husband; other racing news noted.
snippet: The IndyCar community shed tears and shared laughs Sunday in tribute to the two-time Indianapolis 500 winner Dan Wheldon.
lead_paragraph: The IndyCar community shed tears and shared laughs Sunday in tribute to the two-time Indianapolis 500 winner Dan Wheldon.

headline.main: Wheldon Is Remembered at Service in Indianapolis
headline.print_headline: Wheldon Is Remembered at Service in Indianapolis
headline.seo: Wheldon Is Remembered at Service in Indianapolis
